Title: Left Side of a Double-page Opening Inscribed with Verses of Chapter 1
Medium: ink and pigments on thick cream-colored, gold-flecked paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.569 is the left side of a double-page opening decoration containing the text of chapter 1 (Surat al-fatihah) inscribed in the center medallion in gold Muhaqqaq script on a blue background.
Keywords: Koran; Prayer; Qur`an; Arabic; Islamic; Safavid; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Manuscript; Ornament; Iran; Scripture; Fortune-telling; Devotion
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Iranian
